name: Nords Odyssey
description:
Nords Odyssey is a game about a Viking's ship journey where you must manage three resources: Supplies, Warriors and Morale.

Each day an event will trigger and it's up to you to decide how to solve it.

Warriors eat one supply per day, if they go hungry, morale will go down. If morale is down there's a chance of warriors to desert your ranks. Try to keep the resources balanced and make it until the end of the journey!

Submission for Mini-Jam #35 

Authors: dasPanjo & jvolonte
